mapper.insert: insert into bbs.hello_board (b_title, b_writer, b_detail, b_date) values(#{b_title},#{b_writer},#{b_detail},SYSDATE())
mapper.select: select b_no , b_title , b_detail , b_writer , b_date , b_count from bbs.hello_board where b_no = #{b_no}
select count(*) AS count from bbs.hello_board
select b_no , b_title , b_detail , b_writer , b_date , b_count from bbs.hello_board order by b_no DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.update: update bbs.hello_board set b_title=#{b_title} , b_detail = #{b_detail} where b_no = #{b_no}
update bbs.hello_board set b_count = b_count+1 where b_no= #{b_no}
